content: I'm gonna make a change for once in my life. Gonna feel real good, gonna make a difference, gonna make it right. As I turn up the collar on my favorite winter coat, this wind is blowing my mind. I see the kids in the street, with not enough to eat. Who am I to be blind, pretending not to see their needs. A summer's disregard, a broken bottle top, and a one man's soul. They follow each other on the wind, ya know. 'Cause they got nowhere to go, that's why I want you to know.
author: Michael Jackson
